description: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE HON. VALERIE E. CAPRONI: HABEAS CORPUS: re: 1 Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus filed by Yusuf Sparks. For the foregoing reasons, I recommend that the Petition for habeas corpus be DENIED and the case DISMISSED. Petitioners remaining arguments, to the extent not addressed explicitly herein, have been considered by the Court and found to be without merit. Pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 636(b)(1) and Rules 72, 6(a), and 6(d) of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure, the parties shall have fourteen (14) days to file written objections to this Report and Recommendation. Such objections shall be filed with the Clerk of the Court, with extra copies delivered to the Chambers of the Honorable Valerie E. Caproni, United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 240, New York, New York 10007, and to the Chambers of the undersigned, 500 Pearl Street, Room 1960, New York, New York 10007. Failure to file timely objections will preclude appellate review. So ordered. Objections to R&R due by 11/7/2019 (Signed by Magistrate Judge Robert W. Lehrburger on 10/24/2019) Copies transmitted to all counsel of record and mailed to Yusuf Sparks(js) (Entered: 10/25/2019)
